author: ohlssrog
body:
# Windows PowerShell

For Windows PowerShell 5.1 issues, suggestions, or feature requests please use the following link instead:
Windows PowerShell [UserVoice](https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell)

This repository is **ONLY** for PowerShell Core 6 issues.

comments.author: ohlssrog
comments.body: Will PS core ever support Windows AdminCenter, meaning that if i install PS 6 or 7 on windows server will Admin center support this and connect to server through PS Core?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
The WAC folks say they are working on PS7 support. However, you should give them the feedback to their Uservoice: https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/295071/category/319162
Management Tools: Windows Admin Center (514 ideas) – Windows Server

title: AdminCenter
